languages.text: "Иногда я забываю, что вы агент Инквизиции. А потом слышу, что вы относитесь к своей старой коллеге как к функции... и все встает на свои места".
"Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."
languages.original_text: "Иногда я забываю, что вы агент Инквизиции. А потом слышу, что вы относитесь к своей старой коллеге как к функции... и все встает на свои места".

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."
"Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."
"Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."
"Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."

languages.text: “有的时候，我会忘记你是审判庭的特工，但听到你以如此冷漠的口吻谈论你曾经的同事……我就知道，一切都回到了原样。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."

traits.locale_text: “有的时候，我会忘记你是审判庭的特工，但听到你以如此冷漠的口吻谈论你曾经的同事……我就知道，一切都回到了原样。”

languages.text: « Des fois, j'oublie que vous êtes un agent de l'Inquisition... mais vous entendre parler de votre ancienne collègue avec une telle froideur suffit à me remettre les idées en place. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."

traits.locale_text: « Des fois, j'oublie que vous êtes un agent de l'Inquisition... mais vous entendre parler de votre ancienne collègue avec une telle froideur suffit à me remettre les idées en place. »

languages.text: «A veces olvido que es agente de la Inquisición, pero cuando habla con esa frialdad de su antigua colega... todo encaja».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."

traits.locale_text: «A veces olvido que es agente de la Inquisición, pero cuando habla con esa frialdad de su antigua colega... todo encaja».

languages.text: 「アンタが異端審問庁のエージェントだって時々忘れるけど、前の同僚をそんなに冷たく言うんだね…何もかもがうまく元通りってことか」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタが異端審問庁のエージェントだって時々忘れるけど、前の同僚をそんなに冷たく言うんだね…何もかもがうまく元通りってことか」

languages.text: "Manchmal vergesse ich, dass Ihr ein Agent der Inquisition seid, doch dann höre ich Euch so kaltherzig von Eurer früheren Kollegin sprechen ... und es wird mir wieder klar."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal vergesse ich, dass Ihr ein Agent der Inquisition seid, doch dann höre ich Euch so kaltherzig von Eurer früheren Kollegin sprechen ... und es wird mir wieder klar."

languages.original_text: "Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."

languages.text: "Bazen senin bir Engizisyon vekili olduğunu unutuyorum, sonra eski meslektaşınla ilgili duygusuzca konuşuyorsun... Tüm taşlar yerine oturuyor."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I forget you are an agent of the Inquisition, but then I hear you speak so coldly of your former colleague... and everything falls back into place."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen senin bir Engizisyon vekili olduğunu unutuyorum ama sonra eski meslektaşınla ilgili duygusuzca konuştuğunu duyuyorum... Sonra tüm taşlar yerine oturuyor."
